title: Proximity to land determines how coral reef communities respond to climate change events

title_detail.value: Proximity to land determines how coral reef communities respond to climate change events

summary: Severe weather and environmental disturbances, such as cyclones or thermal coral bleaching, affect specific areas of coral reefs differently, new research has shown.

summary_detail.value: Severe weather and environmental disturbances, such as cyclones or thermal coral bleaching, affect specific areas of coral reefs differently, new research has shown.
